ribbon.title:
Privacy as a choice.
A secure and anonymous
cryptocurrency.
ribbon.text: Built with a focus on privacy.

intro.h2: Verge uses multiple anonymity-centric networks such as TOR and I2P. The IP addresses of the users are fully obfuscated and transactions are completely untraceable.
intro.p: We care about your privacy. Do you?

benefit_1.title: ANONYMITY
benefit_1.text: Verge uses multiple anonymity-centric networks such as TOR and I2P. The IP addresses of the users are fully obfuscated. The Core QT wallet has built-in TOR integration as well as SSL encryption which adds an extra level of security.

benefit_2.title: COMMUNITY DRIVEN
benefit_2.text: Verge is an open source project with an active team of developers from all over the world. The development team is always in close contact with the community. Verge is not a private company funded through an ICO or premining.

benefit_3.title: MASS ADOPTION
benefit_3.text: Low fees, quick transactions, high volume in circulation, multiplatform support, Wraith protocol are the ingredients that make Verge perfectly positioned for mass adoption. Transact on the public ledger for everyday purchases or stay private if you wish so.

benefit_4.title: PRIVACY AS A CHOICE
benefit_4.text: Wraith Protocol is a technology that allows the user to choose between public and private ledgers on the same blockchain. Users are free to choose which ledger they want to utilize for each transaction.
